description.value:
Magical reagents slosh inside this rime-frosted pottery jar the size of a human head. Despite appearing to be rimed in hoarfrost, the jar is warm to the touch. Ilverani wizards create rime jars to sustain themselves during the coldest winter nights.

Activateâ€”Siphon Chill3(manipulate)

Effect The jar draws off the cold and warms your body. If you have the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Fatigued] condition caused by exposure to environmental cold, it removes the condition. For 8 hours after applying the rime, you treat extreme cold as severe cold.
